item.title: Pete Alonso's three most aggressive suitors so far -- and a few other fits for the free agent first baseman
item.description: For a second straight winter, the Mets' franchise home run king is seeking a long-term deal. Where might he land?

item.title: Clarity or more chaos? Breaking down the key games of Week 13
item.description: A Big Ten showdown in the West, playoff hopefuls trying hang on and the potential to clear things up in the ACC.

item.title: South Korean 3B Song posted after 26-HR season
item.description: South Korean infielder Sung-mun Song is entering MLB's posting system and will be available for teams to sign through Dec. 21.

item.title: LSU formally acts to fire Kelly in response to suit
item.description: The LSU board of supervisors authorized new university president Wade Rousse to send former Tigers football coach Brian Kelly a formal notice of termi...

item.title: Sources: Liberty tab Warriors' DeMarco as coach
item.description: The Liberty have agreed to a deal to hire Chris DeMarco, who has been with the Warriors since 2012, as their new coach, sources told ESPN.
